name: Wildlife cheetah Attack simulator 3D – Chase the wild animals, hunt them in this safari adventure
name_original: Wildlife cheetah Attack simulator 3D – Chase the wild animals, hunt them in this safari adventure
description:
Young cheetah is alone in the jungle he needs to learn hunting as quick as possible for survival. Play your role as a wild cheetah and control it to hunt down fast running animals in this realistic wildlife environment. Wild cheetah attack simulator is a realistic wildlife experience of controlling a fast running cheetah in a dark deadly forest. That’s not it your mission objective also includes killing elephants, lions and hippos to secure your area.


In this simulator game you will experience real time wildlife adventure with 15 extreme forest journeys of hunt and survival. Live the adventures life of a cheetah with extreme challenges to survive and to satisfy the hunger. This animal’s simulator game provides you the real life animal’s safari which highlights the actual life of a cheetah. To enhance your gaming experience multiple playing modes are available with free roam mode and mission mode.

Features

-          15 wildlife forest journeys.
-          Different animal categories to chase and hunt.
-          Multiple modes to match your mood.
-          Realistic city and forest environment with HD graphics.
-          Lifelike jungles background sounds.
-          Smooth and user friendly controls.
